name: @diplomatiq/convertibles
description: TypeScript utility library to convert values between textual and binary representation.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run check-release-tag && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test: cross-env-shell TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.test.json nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text mocha --require ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register --recursive test/**/*.test.ts
scripts.version: node --experimental-modules scripts/sync-sonar-version.mjs && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add sonar-project.properties CHANGELOG.md

author: Diplomatiq

hooks.pre-push: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
